yes this movie is for real i would not say its dvd qaulity the film is hissy (or might be my speakers) and the picture is not wot i would call dvd quality but at 300MB for the file and a 2 minute D/L im not complaining thanks upper

The audio quality is pathetic. Other 400mb MKVs have much better audio. This movie is supposed to be atmospheric but all that is ruined due to poor audio.

Atleast upload a sample from next time so that downloaders can judge. Thanks for the efforts though.
